**Example 1: 查询函数类型**



Input: 

```
tccli wedata DescribeFunctionTypes --cli-unfold-argument ```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "ErrorMessage": null,
        "RequestId": "0d7fda9a-607d-4e0b-817e-b6d39dd18005",
        "Types": [
            {
                "Name": "日期函数",
                "EnName": "date",
                "ZhName": "日期函数"
            }
        ]
    }
}
```
